subject: We are upgrading your Kinsta site by moving it to a faster machine 🚀
preview: Hello Wolf IQ, We're writing to you today with some great news. As you may know, Kinsta runs on the Google Cloud Platform. When Google makes new, more powerful machines available, we like to take adva

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hello Wolf IQ,

We're writing to you today with some great news. As you may know, Kinsta runs on the Google Cloud Platform. When Google makes new, more powerful machines available, we like to take advantage of the improvements. That's happening now!

We're migrating sites to newer, more powerful C3D machines in Frankfurt, Germany, and Sydney, Australia. These machines are not only more powerful but also more reliable, with more consistent performance and improved isolation and security. We're excited to bring these upgrades to you and your websites at no additional charge.

Since you have one or more sites in the Frankfurt or Sydney regions, we want to let you know that we will migrate the following sites to C3D machines on Monday, August 12, Tuesday, August 13, or Wednesday, August 14.

Migrations will happen during the daily maintenance period (between 2 a.m. and 5 a.m. local time for the region), and downtime will be from 3 to 8 minutes (though a small subset of migrations could take 15 to 20 minutes).

Our testing shows the C3D machine's response time to be from 20% to 50% faster than the average response time of the machines we currently use. Their speed is enhanced by unlimited IO throughput, newer CPUs with higher clock speeds, and the ability to utilize up to 360 vCPUs and 3 TB of DDR5 memory. The C3D machines will easily handle significantly more demanding workloads.

We have successfully migrated thousands of client sites to the new C3D machines in other regions and are confident in the process. We don't anticipate any issues while moving your site(s).

As always, we appreciate you being a Kinsta client. If you have questions, don't hesitate to reply to this email or contact us in MyKinsta. We're here to answer your questions.

Thank you!
The Kinsta Team
You are receiving this email because you have an account at Kinsta.
